title: न्यूज़ चैनल का फ़र्ज़ी दावा: कर्नाटक में विदेश से लौटे चार मुस्लिम युवकों ने कोरोना का टेस्ट करवाने से किया इनकार
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Islam does not approve: Four Muslims who returned from Dubai threaten health officials in Karnataka, refuse to undergo Coronavirus test https://t.co/wTj5vDURmX

4 youths have refused to undergo Coronavirus tests after they returned from Dubai, saying their religion doesn’t permit them to do so. #coronavirusindia#CoronaVirusUpdates#WHO#pandemichttps://t.co/FBxvPM3TLr
